title: Ep. 770 The Liberal Rage Machine
description:
Summary:
What is the Swamp hiding? This latest revelation by Republicans looking into Spygate offers us some tantalizing clues. In this episode I address the growing efforts by the Swamp to sweep the scandal under the rug. 
 
News Picks:
This Victor Davis Hanson piece addresses the limitless rage of the Left directed at President Trump.
 
This Chuck Ross piece discusses the questionable sourcing of the dirty dossier.
 
This Byron York piece addresses some questionable redactions in the FISA application.
 
What is going on in New York with the governor?
 
Escaping New York’s high taxes may be more difficult than you thought.
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
